info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:25PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips and west central Valley Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 824 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitewater, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Saco, Hinsdale and Sleeping Buffalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
